author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Antec Flux Pro case on Amazon https://geni.us/CaPv
In hardware news this week, we talk about a former founding member of the Xbox saying she is struggling to find a modern reason to buy Xbox hardware, the good news for Stop Killing Games (but it's not over yet!), and NVIDIA's next round of GPUs.

Watch our prior @GNCAInvestigates discussion with Ross about Stop Killing Games: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9ahH6HrtTc
Accursed Farms here for more Stop Killing Games updates: @Accursed_Farms 
Sign the EU Citizens' Initiative: https://eci.ec.europa.eu/045/public/#/screen/home
Sign the UK Petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702074/
Laura Fryer on the future of Xbox: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lFG7YxFFCnY

Separately, check out our thermal paste factory tour from previously to get ready for the liquid metal one! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsIk_mMrt2w

Additional sources doc: https://www.one-tab.com/page/1Y1ELPugSfSl3QnmmydtNQ

The best way to support our
title: HW News - "Xbox Hardware is Dead," Good News for Stop Killing Games, NVIDIA 5070 Ti "Super"
